Articles.Content: Well i decided to sign up on forums and wait for launch on xbox, very excited on the news!

Welcome to the forums! If you have a laptop/computer, KSP is always good there, as it allows easier modding and the like, and less peasantry. But I won't name you as a peasant, as you seem to be a pretty cool guy. Especially since you can spell. Hope you have fun, and if you're looking to be involved more in the game & it's community, such as Rocket Builders, Spacecraft Exchange and the forums that generally tend to show screenshots and craft download links, then laptop/PC is you're only way, but I won't go on too much to you, I hope you like it here and have fun!
Welcome! Here, have a welcoming rep cookie for being the early Xbox bird.
Welcome to the forums. I would imagine at some point they will add a console section here. In the meantime, browse around, there is a lot of info to learn.
